about_the_game:
🍳 Run Your Own Restaurant! 🍽️ Transform a run-down fast food place into a renowned gourmet restaurant!
  • Take Orders 📝
  • Prepare Ingredients 🥦
  • Plate Up the Food 🍲
  • Keep the Restaurant Clean 🧹
  • Order Needed Ingredients 📦


👥 Work Alone or with Your Friends Online! 🤝 Split up tasks and collaborate to meet the ever-increasing demands of your customers.


🌍 Choose from a Wide Array of Dishes 🌮🍕 Create your own unique dining experience with culinary delights from all over the world.


📈 Rise Up the Ranks of Local Restaurants! 🏆 Unlock essential kitchen equipment and furnishings to turn your place into the best in town.


🎨 Customize Your Restaurant 🎉 Set the perfect ambiance and personalize every detail:

  • Tables 💁‍♀️
  • Chairs 🪑
  • Art 🎨
  • Lights 💡
  • Walls 🏰
  • Floor 🌅
  • Ceiling 🌌
Get ready for an immersive and exciting restaurant management experience! Embrace the challenge, show off your culinary skills, and create the dining haven of your dreams! 🔥💼

name: Cooking Crew Demo
short_description: Join forces online with friends or go solo in this immersive restaurant simulator! Transform an empty restaurant into a bustling hotspot, upgrade your kitchen and serve a variety of delicious dishes. Can you handle the heat and satisfy every hungry customer?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
